Rosie O: Donnell tweeted an "offer" of two million dollars each to Senators Flake and Collins if they voted "no" on a GOP tax bill.
The claim that O: Donnell broke federal law by posting her tweet is based on a largely superficial and incomplete legal analysis.
O: Donnell's tweet was obviously a hypothetical bit of humor intended to make a point, and neither Flake nor Collins voted against the bill.
Despite the suggestion that O: Donnell had broken federal bribery laws, it is highly unlikely that a case against her would make it very far based on the standard of evidence required for conviction.
